entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 11:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NNE 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain becoming mixed with flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
